overview: The classic rivalry of Tom and Jerry, cartoon land's most popular cat-and-mouse team, is updated for a new generation with the first new shorts in more than 30 years. The fur-raising chases, narrow escapes and outrageous slapstick continue in 12 episodes of the new series. The hectic high jinks include "Medieval Menace," "Fire-Breathing Tomcat," "Digital Dilemma," "Treasure Map Scrap" and more.
title: Tom and Jerry Tales, Vol. 2
